trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a unit of work that a user can undo.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> class is a nested class within <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoEngine%2A> that encapsulates an action that a user can undo.
The default <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> implementation monitors change notifications and builds up a list of events for each change.
It saves these events using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService>.

An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> receives event notifications for changes directly from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoEngine%2A> through several `public virtual` methods.
You can derive from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> and perform any additional logic.
If desired, you can completely bypass the default <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> implementation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit"></xref> class.
The undo engine that owns this undo unit.
The name for this undo unit.
engine is `null`.
Receives a call from the undo engine to close this unit.
When a unit is closed, no more events can come into its various event methods.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> itself may take action here to ensure that any events that are currently open are closed.
Receives a call from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine"></xref> in response to a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Receives a call from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine"></xref> in response to a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.

Receives a call from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine"></xref> in response to a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.

Receives a call from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine"></xref> in response to a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.

Receives a call from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine"></xref> in response to a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.

Receives a call from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine"></xref> in response to a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Receives a call from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine"></xref> in response to a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRename"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentRenameEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Gets an instance of the requested service.
The type of service to retrieve.
An instance of the given service, or `null` if the service cannot be resolved.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit"></xref> contains no events.
The undo engine may discard empty units.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit"></xref> contains no events; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit"></xref>.
Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the current name of the unit.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the current name of the unit.
Performs an undo or redo action.
Undo actions toggle themselves between undo and redo states, so calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> twice sets the object back to its original state.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> class initially assumes that the undoable work has already been done, so the first call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> undoes the work.
The next call undoes the previous undo operation, performing a redo.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore%2A> method to perform an undo operation.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> method itself works to maintain consistent state within the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit>, even in the event of an exception thrown by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore%2A>.
Called by <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo"></xref> to perform an undo action.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore%2A> method to perform an undo operation.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> method itself works to maintain consistent state within the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit>, even in the event of an exception thrown by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore%2A>.
Gets the parent <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoEngine"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoEngine"></xref> to which this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit"></xref> is attached.
